gameDetails.name: Hamburgum: Lisboa
gameDetails.description:
This is an alternative map especially created for LeiriaCon 2008 and SpielPortugal by Mac Gerdts.

The map represents the city of Lisbon and its churches.

It has some changes in the rules such as:
The donations have to follow a given order (from #1 to #5)
The map has no divisions. Meaning that every bonus is related to the whole map and not only to a given neighborhood.
For historical and cultural flavor, players produce Wine instead of Beer.

The game components:
1 Map of Lisboa
30 bonus tiles of 6 different churches

The rest of the materials are from Hamburgum.

Expands

    Hamburgum
